abstract: William A. Ackman, head of Pershing Square Capital Management, is considering raising as much as $3 billion for a new portfolio through an initial public offering.
snippet: William A. Ackman, head of Pershing Square Capital Management, is considering raising as much as $3 billion for a new portfolio through an initial public offering.

headline.main: Ackman Ponders I.P.O. for New Fund
